member.name: M:DesignImagerNp.controls.DesignImager.GetImage
member.summary:
Returns the randered image in a datatable.
The datatable has the following format
Colume 0:
- Name: "id"
- Datatype: Int
- Default value -1
Colume 1:
- Name: "imageData"
- Datatype: byte[]
- Contains byte array of the image

member.name: M:DesignImagerNp.controls.DesignImager.LoadDesign(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary:
Loads the xamls of individual element from datatable into the canvas.
/// The datatable should have the following format
Colume 0:
- Name: "id"
- Datatype: Int
Colume 1:
- Name: "xaml"
- Datatype: string
- Contains valid xaml of UI element for a canvas

member.name: T:DesignImagerNp.controls.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DesignImagerNp.controls.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DesignImagerNp.controls.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
